response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. For this incredible opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $12,000. This price includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to hearing your response and making this valuable addition to your collection.", "product_price": 12000}
